/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and pedestrians adding life to the scene. The buildings lining the street are predominantly white and gray, their monotone palette punctuated by occasional splashes of red and green. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting a bright light that illuminates the scene. The image is slightly blurred, adding a sense of motion and dynamism to the scene.
